page.title: 16Employment in Maylands
page.content: The type of employment is varied. There are a number of{small factories in an industrial estate.A manufacturer of drawing office equipment{employs 18 people, a boatyard and chandlers shop {12,}and a nursery and garden centre{7. The two pubs empoly local labour as do the restaurant and shops. The farms employ little outside labour. {Labour relations}are good as the workforce is fairly young and interested in the work. There is an independent attitude especially among those working in family businesses. {Unemployment}is difficult to asses but it cannot be high and a number of people work from home as one man businesses.
